description: When setting a quota using nova-manage, (I believe) you set it by name, and this value is inserted into the table by name (e.g. project1).  However, when the quota is retrieved, it is looked up by UUID, so the quotas are not found.
title: Confusion between UUID and name in quota_get_all_by_project

comments.content: When setting a quota using nova-manage, (I believe) you set it by name, and this value is inserted into the table by name (e.g. project1).  However, when the quota is retrieved, it is looked up by UUID, so the quotas are not found.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~justin-fathomdb

comments.content: you actually need to set it via project_id now
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content: So is this a documentation issue ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Marking Nova task invalid, please open a openstack-manuals task on this bug ("Also affects...") if you think the doc is lacking.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
